description.default: Finds exactly what you're looking for

disabled.description: Disable MCP endpoint for this public endpoint
Disable search endpoint for this public endpoint

exclude_items.description: List of path patterns to exclude. Uses micromatch glob syntax: * matches within a path segment, ** matches across path segments (e.g., /admin/** matches /admin/users and /admin/settings/advanced)

include_items.description: List of path patterns to include. Uses micromatch glob syntax: * matches within a path segment, ** matches across path segments (e.g., /blog/** matches /blog/post and /blog/2024/post)

specific_sitemaps.description: List of specific sitemap URLs to use for crawling. Only valid when parse_type is 'sitemap'.
